app.title: MentorFlow
app.description: Track your mentoring sessions, set goals, and help your mentees grow

landing.feature1Desc: Keep track of all your mentees, their goals, and progress in one place
landing.feature2Desc: Log sessions, add notes, and define next steps for each meeting
landing.feature3Desc: All data stays on your device. No account needed, no cloud sync
landing.privacyNote: Your data is stored locally in your browser. Nothing is sent to any server.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.noMenteesDescription: Create your first mentee to get started
dashboard.selectMenteeDescription: Choose a mentee from the sidebar or create a new one

mentee.name: Name
mentee.goalPlaceholder: What does the mentee want to achieve?
mentee.noSessionsDescription: Add a session to track your mentoring

confirm.archiveMessage: Are you sure you want to archive this mentee? They will be hidden from the main list.
confirm.unarchiveMessage: Are you sure you want to unarchive this mentee? They will appear in the main list again.
confirm.deleteMenteeMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this mentee? This will also delete all their sessions. This action cannot be undone.
confirm.deleteSessionMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this session? This action cannot be undone.

backup.title: Backup & Restore
backup.exportDescription: Download all your data as a JSON file
backup.importDescription: Replace all data from a backup file
backup.importConfirmMessage: This will replace all your current data. Are you sure?
backup.importError: Failed to import data. Invalid file format.

about.title: About MentorFlow
about.description: A simple and private app for managing your mentoring sessions and tracking your mentees' progress.
about.feature1Desc: All data is stored locally in your browser
about.faq1Answer: All your data is stored locally in your browser using IndexedDB. It is never sent to any server.
about.faq2Question: Can I use MentorFlow on multiple devices?
about.faq2Answer: Each device maintains its own data. You can export and import data manually if you need to transfer it.
about.faq3Question: What happens if I clear browser data?
about.faq3Answer: If you clear your browser data or switch browsers, you will lose your data. We recommend making periodic exports.
about.faq4Answer: Yes, MentorFlow is completely free and open source.
